trends: There have been 5 other sightings in San Ramon
There were no other sightings in San Ramon on or around October 31st 2012
Summary: I thought it was plane landing on freeway but it stopped and hovered as I passed it.
divs: sighting details10\31\12 i was headed northbound on 680 through san ramon ca between alcosta and bollinger exits. at 10:10pm. i had noticed a white, red and blue lights of what i thought was a plane. i had not seen a flight path right over freeway so i wondered if they were going to do an emergency landing. as i got closer i was shocked to realize that i was passing the object and could now see the belly if it. it had five lights in a pentagon formation that lit up the underside. it looked as if it were stopped right above san ramon valley blvd that runs parallel to freeway. it was very low, a little above the tree line. as i was driving i had to keep my eyes on the road but kept glancing at it. i decided to get off at exit exit and flip around. as i neared exit i looked back and could only see 3 white lights now that faded quickly. it was gone before i could turn around. i called my aunt then and told her what i saw. there was light traffic at the time yet at least five cars got off on same exit as i did but they all turned the other way. i remember thinking at the time i saw it if anyone in the other cars had seen it as well.
